entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
